oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Spanish moss horse blanket
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Horse blanket made from woven fibers of Spanish moss. The blanket was dug from the Trinity Lane, Bicentennial Mall area (Nashville, Tennessee) in 1996-1997. The site was part of the city dump during the Civil War.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Fort Negley, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
